text: Niccayamaka ‘sahpa' (malaiyum) ‘marva' (malaiyum, vanakkattirkaka erpatuttappatta) allahvin ataiyalankalil ullavaiyaka irukkinrana. Akaiyal evarkal (‘ka'apa' ennum) avvittai ‘hajju' allatu ‘umra' ceytarkalo avarkal, avvirantaiyum curri varuvatu kurramillai. Akave, evarenum nanmaiyai nati (avvaru) ceytal niccayamaka allah (atarku) nanri parattuvan, avarutaiya (ennankalai) nankarivan
